languages.text: Человеку не дано узреть Смерть до срока — это есть заблуждение живых. Внемли. Мы же говорим: для сильного духа возможен путь туда и путь обратно. Внемли, как велик{mf|ий|ая} Домин'{name} спустил{mf|ся|ась} в царство мертвых за своей тенью.

No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Domin'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.
languages.original_text: Человеку не дано узреть Смерть до срока — это есть заблуждение живых. Внемли. Мы же говорим: для сильного духа возможен путь туда и путь обратно. Внемли, как велик{mf|ий|ая} Домин'{name} спустил{mf|ся|ась} в царство мертвых за своей тенью.

traits.locale_text: No human will see Death before their time is due: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To that we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Enim'{name} descending into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

No human will see Death before their time is due: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To that we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Enim'{name} descending into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Enim'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Enim'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Domin'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Domin'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

languages.text: Kein Mensch wird je den Tod vor seiner Zeit sehen. Das ist der Irrglaube der Lebenden. Höret. Will sagen: Ein starker Geist kann dorthin reisen und auch den Rückweg überstehen. Höret die Geschichte {mf|des|der} großen Domin'{name}, {mf|der|die} in das Königreich der Toten hinabstieg, um {mf|seinen|ihren} Schatten zu retten.
languages.original_text: No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Domin'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

traits.locale_text: Kein Mensch wird je den Tod vor seiner Zeit sehen. Das ist der Irrglaube der Lebenden. Höret. Will sagen: Ein starker Geist kann dorthin reisen und auch den Rückweg überstehen. Höret die Geschichte {mf|des|der} großen Domin'{name}, {mf|der|die} in das Königreich der Toten hinabstieg, um {mf|seinen|ihren} Schatten zu retten.

languages.text: Que ningún humano verá la muerte antes de que llegue su hora: tal es el delirio de los vivos. Escuchad. Nuestra respuesta es que un espíritu fuerte puede ir y volver. Escuchad la historia de{mf|l| la} gran Domin'{name}, que descendió al reino de los muertos para recuperar a su sombra.
languages.original_text: No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Domin'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

traits.locale_text: Que ningún humano verá la muerte antes de que llegue su hora: tal es el delirio de los vivos. Escuchad. Nuestra respuesta es que un espíritu fuerte puede ir y volver. Escuchad la historia de{mf|l| la} gran Domin'{name}, que descendió al reino de los muertos para recuperar a su sombra.

languages.text: 人間が、時が来るまで死を見ることはない。それは生者の妄想である。耳を傾けよ。それに対して我らはこう告げる。強い精神はそこへと旅し、戻ってくることができる。偉大なるドミン・{name}の物語に耳を傾けよ。彼は死者の王国に降り立ち、自身の影を取り戻したのだ。
languages.original_text: No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Domin'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

traits.locale_text: 人間が、時が来るまで死を見ることはない。それは生者の妄想である。耳を傾けよ。それに対して我らはこう告げる。強い精神はそこへと旅し、戻ってくることができる。偉大なるエニム・{name}の物語に耳を傾けよ。彼は死者の王国に降り立ち、自身の影を取り戻したのだ。

languages.text: 没有任何人能在大限到来之前见证死亡，那不过是生者的妄想罢了。正因如此，我们才会认为，只有强大的灵魂才能抵达死者的国度，再从彼岸返回。仔细聆听伟大秘者{name}的传说吧，{mf|他|她}曾前往死者的国度，试图取回{mf|他|她}的影子。
languages.original_text: No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Domin'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

traits.locale_text: 没有任何人能在大限到来之前见证死亡，那不过是生者的妄想罢了。正因如此，我们才会认为，只有强大的灵魂才能抵达死者的国度，再从彼岸返回。仔细聆听伟大秘者{name}的传说吧，{mf|他|她}曾前往死者的国度，试图取回{mf|他|她}的影子。

languages.text: Aucun être humain ne verra la mort avant son heure : telle est l'illusion des vivants. Écoutez. Ce à quoi nous répondons qu'un esprit suffisamment fort peut s'y rendre et en revenir. Écoutez l'histoire de l'honorable Domin'{name}, qui descendit dans le royaume de la Mort pour retrouver son ombre.
languages.original_text: No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Domin'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.

traits.locale_text: Aucun être humain ne verra la mort avant son heure : telle est l'illusion des vivants. Écoutez. Ce à quoi nous répondons qu'un esprit suffisamment fort peut s'y rendre et en revenir. Écoutez l'histoire de l'honorable Domin'{name}, qui descendit dans le royaume de la Mort pour retrouver son ombre.

languages.text: Hiçbir insan, vakti dolmadan önce Ölüm'ü göremez. Bu, yaşayanların hezeyanıdır. Kulak verin. Buna karşılık biz deriz ki kuvvetli bir ruh, oraya seyahat edip dönüş yolculuğunu başarıyla tamamlayabilir. Gölgesini geri almak için ölülerin krallığına inmiş, {name} ismindeki kudretli Domin'in hikâyesine kulak verin.
languages.original_text: No human will see Death before their time: that is the delusion of the living. Heed. To which we say: a strong spirit can travel there and make the journey back. Heed the tale of the great Domin'{name}, who descended into the kingdom of the dead to retrieve {mf|his|her} shadow.
